DataElement.preferredName: TAPS Tool - Interviewer Version 1.0 Past 3 Months Other Drug Taken Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the name of another drug they took, not previously mentioned, in the past three months.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: TAPS Tool - Interviewer Version Past 3 Months Other Drug Taken
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An instrument designed to screen and assess adult primary care patients for tobacco, alcohol, prescription drug, and drug use and problems related to their use._A period of time consisting of the 3 months before the present._A question about what other drug an individual is taking or took.
